General.Name: Oponeo.pl SA
General.Description: Oponeo.pl S.A. engages in the online retail of tires and wheels for motor vehicles in Poland and internationally. It also offers steel and aluminum wheels, and snow chains. The company's tires are used in passenger cars, light commercial vehicles, four-wheel drive vehicles, trucks, motorcycles, and quads. Oponeo.pl S.A. was founded in 1999 and is based in Bydgoszcz, Poland.
